brief_summary.textblock: To determine the incidence of glaucoma following bilateral congenital cataract removal and estimate the associated risk factors in a large cohort to provide guidance for clinical practice.

detailed_description.textblock: A prospective longitudinal cohort study of pediatric patients who underwent surgery for congenital/infantile cataracts between January 2011 and December 2025 was performed.

primary_outcome.measure: the incidence of glaucoma after congenital cataract surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Risk factors of glaucoma after congenital cataract surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Piecewise exponential survival models with mixed effects (PEWSMME) were used.(variables including demographic characters, surgery categories, clinical history, length of follow up).

study_pop.textblock: A prospective longitudinal cohort study of pediatric patients who underwent surgery for congenital cataracts was performed.
